title: Take this projector and shove it
body:
The projector installer arrived today. After assembling most of the pieces, he ran across a huge problem. As it turns out, our projection booth isn't big enough. I'm sorry guys, but that's the final nail in The Moxie's coffin. We've had a good run. Thanks for the memories.

NOT!!!!!!!

Actually, the projector installation is going great! The top reel fits perfectly into the vault we built into the ceiling; the big wooden base we built to lift the projector high enough (you remember) is the perfect height; and there's still enough room to lay down on the nice plush carpet! As it is with most installations of used projection equipment, we're missing a few pieces here and there, but they'll be shipped down to us tomorrow. It's very exciting... having a gigantic piece of machinery shoved into a room no bigger than a typical bathroom. It's like bathing with Benzo. Hott!

This is the part where I'd usually insert some amazing pictures, but I left my camera at the theater. Sorry! I'll post them tomorrow... word!

Oh yeah, we also decided on an EXACT DATE for our grand opening. Good night!
author: Dan

comments.author: Rachel
comments.body: no wonder all the boys love you

comments.author: Jay
comments.body: You are a bad, bad man.

comments.author: Carl
comments.body: OK when do we get to know the date????

comments.author: steph v. horn
comments.body:
I know the date. Advantages of being the twin sister, eh?

I'm keeping my mouth shut though. Don't you worry.

comments.author: Steve
comments.body:
My heart just literally jumped out of my chest. Give me a minute whilst I recover it...

DON'T DO THAT! Geez. I'm older than most of you guys (45). Don't think I can take much more of that...

Keep us posted Big D...
